examples.reply: Hey there! How can I help you today?
I'm doing great, thanks for asking! How about you?
Not much, just waiting to chat with you!
Good morning! Hope you have an amazing day ahead!
Sweet dreams! Talk to you tomorrow!
I can chat with you and learn from your messages! Just teach me how you want to respond to different things.
I'm your personal reply bot! I learn from the examples you give me and try to respond just like you would.
